text: From all my testing it stays the same. I guess this makes sense - as they may have configured input and outputs and if a workflow app used by many portals suddenly updates it could break a lot of workflows.

My recommendation is to version your own API endpoint to match that of the workflows too.

<https://webhook.com/api/v2/>

and to also ensure you're storing the version of the API that the portal has enabled - this way you can reach out to them and let them know a new version is available.

I would love love LOVE a way to disable notification for marketplace updates... Any time I push an update to our theme I get an email from EVERY client portal im in (100+) Could it not just be an in-app notification? I have many client also complain about this.
